Easy.Q: What is the opposite of spending?
What is it called when you buy something?
What is the money you receive for doing chores or as a gift?
What is the place where you keep your money safe?
What do you call a plan for how you will spend your money?
What is it called when you give money to help others?
What do you call something you want but don't need?
What do you call something you must have, like food or shelter?
What is the money you earn from a job called?
What is the price or amount of money an item costs?

Medium.Q: What is it called when you put money aside for a big purchase in the future?
What do you call the money the bank pays you for keeping your money with them?
What is it called when something costs less than usual?
What do you call your spending habits?
What is a small, portable case for holding money?

Hard.Q: What is it called when you buy something without planning to?
What do you call it when you trade goods or services without using money?
What is it called when the value of money goes down over time?
What do you call it when you put money into something hoping to make more money?
What is the tax you pay when you buy something?
